extensionDescription.message: Sends your inactive tabs to sleep

defaultTitle.description: tooltip shown in the main Google Chrome toolbar

saveOptions.description: status text when options are saved

optionsFirstParagraph.message: Here you can input a whitelist for URLs which should not be hibernated when pressing the "send inactive tabs to sleep"-Button.

optionsSecondParagraph.message: For example: if you want to whitelist "sub.example.com" and "test.example.com", you MUST put them both and can't just type "*.example.com"

optionsThirdParagraph.message: You can also put something like "example.com/path/" in here, if you don't want to whitelist the whole domain.

optionsFirstStrong.message: URLs must be complete and include http/https!

hibernationPageInfo.description: info shown when page is hibernating

hibernationPageButton.description: text of the button to wake up a hibernating page
